live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
45455.summary: Some customers in West Huntington Hills area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
45455.title: Dec 29 – Calgary (West Huntington Hills) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
